Verses: 1  naan Manushar Baashaigalaiyum Thoodharbaashaigalaiyum Pesinaalum, Anbu Enakkiraavittaal, Saththamidugira Vengalampolavum, Osaiyidugira Kaiththaalampolavum Iruppen.

2  naan Theerkkadharisana Varaththai Udaiyavanaayirundhu, Sagala Iragasiyangalaiyum, Sagala Arivaiyum Arindhaalum, Malaigalaip Perkkaththakkadhaaga Sagala Visuvaasamullavanaayirundhaalum, Anbu Enakkiraavittaal Naan Ondrumillai.
3  enakku Undaana Yaavatraiyum Naan Annadhaanampanninaalum, En Sareeraththaich Sutterikkappaduvadharkuk Koduththaalum, Anbu Enakkiraavittaal Enakkup Pirayojanam Ondrumillai.
4  anbu Neediya Saandhamum Dhayavumulladhu; Anbukkup Poraamaiyillai; Anbu Thannaip Pugazhaadhu, Irumaappaayiraadhu,
5  ayokkiyamaanadhai Seyyaadhu, Tharpozhivai Naadaadhu, Sinamadaiyaadhu, Theengu Ninaiyaadhu,
7  sagalaththaiyum Thaangum, Sagalaththaiyum Visuvaasikkum, Sagalaththaiyum Nambum, Sagalaththaiyum Sagikkum.
8  anbu Orukkaalum Ozhiyaadhu. Theerkkadharisanangalaanaalum Ozhindhupom, Anniya Baashaigalaanaalum Oindhupom, Arivaanaalum Ozhindhupom.
9  nammudaiya Arivu Kuraivulladhu, Naam Theerkkadharisananj Solludhalum Kuraivulladhu.
11  naan Kuzhandhaiyaayirundhapodhu Kuzhandhaiyaippolap Pesinen, Kuzhandhaiyaippola Sindhiththen, Kuzhandhaiyaippola Yosiththen; Naan Purushanaanapodho Kuzhandhaikketravaigalai Ozhiththuvitten.
12  ippozhudhu Kannaadiyile Nizhalaattamaaip Paarkkirom, Appozhudhu Mugamugamaaip Paarppom; Ippozhudhu Naan Kuraindha Arivullavan, Appozhudhu Naan Ariyappattirukkirapadiye, Arindhukolluven.
13  ippozhudhu Visuvaasam, Nambikkai, Anbu Immoondrum Nilaiththirukkiradhu; Ivaigalil Anbe Periyadhu.
